name: cjxa-scripts
description: Scripts for Javascript for MacOS Javascript for Automation (JXA) Apps bundler.
author: Andreas Heissenberger <andreas@heissenberger.at>

scripts.dev: microbundle watch -i src/init.js -o scripts/init.js -f cjs --target node
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn microbundle -i src/init.js -o scripts/init.js -f cjs --target node
